citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 pm to 1 pm on
January 24, 2023.
During this time, the inspector knocked on doors, called phone number on file leaving a message, waited 30 minutes, and
left a flyer with a note for the licensee to contact him regarding the attempted inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 pm to 1 pm on 
January 24, 2023. 
During this time, the inspector knocked on doors, called phone number on file leaving a message, waited 30 minutes, and 
left a flyer with a note for the licensee to contact him regarding the attempted inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
